name: Perfect Run
description:
With the power of your ship and time travel, can you defeat Cthulhu  in a perfect run?

Perfect Run is a Bullet Hell, Turn Based , Strategy Deck Builder like you have never seen before, (Assuming you have seen one before). Play cards and navigate your ship, and watch your plans unwind.

Required a Controller

Left thumb stick: Move ship

Dpad: Select card

LeftTrigger: Rewind Time

RightTrigger Fastforward Time
